content:
so we have three regressions related to T-libs from crater run (1.51):

  • #82665
    • it was raised on https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/75180#issuecomment-681492119 and seems to have been accepted
  • #82667
    • another instance of #81460
  • #82670
    • caused by #80217, looks like an acceptable one?

that said, I think we can close all of them as an acceptable change, how about?
bump, it'd be great if someone from t-libs could confirm that we can close them, I think we can but I'm not 100% sure :)
@Yuki Okushi hey, sorry. yes, all these are acceptable.
thanks for checking! Then going to close them with a note.
